quotes.quote: True independence and freedom can only exist in doing what's right.
Be an independent thinker at all times, and ignore anyone who attempts to define you in a limiting way.
Independence .... is loyalty to one's best self and principles, and this is often disloyalty to the general idols and fetishes.
I am lord of myself, accountable to none.
The truest test of independent judgment is being able to dislike someone who admires us, and to admire someone who dislikes us.
Independence? That's middle class blasphemy. We are all dependent on one another, every soul of us on earth.
The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud.
I'd rather die my way than live yours.
To find yourself, think for yourself.
If you truly want to be respected by people you love, you must prove to them that you can survive without them.
It's easy to be independent when you've got money. But to be independent when you haven't got a thing—that's the Lord's test.
Independence is essential for permanent but fatal to immediate success.
Rule your mind or it will rule you.
Independence is earned by a few words of cheap confidence.
The price for independence is often isolation and solitude.
He who defines duty for himself is his own master.
I stand for freedom of expression, doing what you believe in, and going after your dreams.
There is often as much independence in not being led, as in not being driven.
Premature independence is the daughter of conceit.
You don't need a significant other to lead a significant life.
Don't depend too much on anyone in this world, because even your own shadow leaves you when you are in darkness.
Never depend on anyone to make you happy....You are responsible for your own happiness.
Financial independence is the ability to live from the income of your own personal resources.
People have only as much liberty as they have the intelligence to want and the courage to take.
Those who deny freedom to others deserve it not for themselves.
Freedom is the right to tell people what they do not want to hear.
A great step towards independence is a good-humored stomach, one that is willing to endure rough treatment.
Freedom means you are unobstructed in living your life as you choose. Anything less is a form of slavery.
Independence is happiness.
Independence doesn't mean you decide the way you want.
It's so important to have that independence. You know it yourself: Everyone needs evenings of their own.
Being brave enough to be alone frees you up to invite people into your life because you want them and not because you need them.
You have to do it yourself, no one else will do it for you. You must work out your own salvation.
No one can build his security upon the nobleness of another person.
The first of earthly blessings, independence.
Nobody gives you a chance... So you just have to stand on your own two feet and take them.
Economic independence is the foundation of the only sort of freedom worth a damn.
Independence means you decide according to the law and the facts.
Freedom consists not in doing what we like, but in having the right to do what we ought.
Freedom is not worth having if it does not include the freedom to make mistakes.
In the truest sense, freedom cannot be bestowed; it must be achieved.
Liberty is always dangerous, but it is the safest thing we have.
Freedom is the will to be responsible to ourselves.
As the American colonies declared their independence from the British empire, they already knew that declaring independence was one thing, securing it was another.
Surely, if anything is proven by whole oceans and continents of evidence, it is the quality of independence was almost wholly left out of the human race.
Liberals sought and achieved independence from Great Britain with the Revolutionary War.
The strongest force in the world today is the desire for national independence, reaching well beyond any ideology or really any national power.
If there is a single issue that divides the world today, it is independence.
The constitution of the united states stresses not independence but interdependence, not the individual liberty of one but the indivisible liberty of all.
The greatest of all human benefits, that, at least, without which no other benefit can be truly enjoyed, is independence.
Let all your views in life be directed to a solid, however moderate, independence; without it no man can be happy nor even honest.
Self-government, self-discipline, self-responsibility are the triple safeguards of the independence of man.
To be independent is the business of a few only; it is the privilege of the strong.
Independence is of more value than any gifts; and to receive gifts is to lose it.
Liberty requires opportunity to make a living--a living which gives a man not only enough to live by, but something to live for.
This right of speech is very dear to the hearts of intelligent lovers of liberty. It is the delights of the lovers of liberty, it is the dread and terror of tyrants.
Too little liberty brings stagnation and too much brings chaos.
But, I’m sick of playing the fool  / I’m probing for His acceptance / I’m yearning for my independence / Not your vengeance…not your eloquence…
With bravery - with bravery / Each man began to feel 'the firm' / No longer owned it for its worm / Their independence they could see / Achieved by simple unity.

Her frank, clear eyes bespeak a mind / Old-world traditions fail to bind / She is not shy / Or bold, but simply self-possessed / Her independence adds a zest / Unto her speech, her piquant jest / Her quaint reply.
A little bit independent with your smile / A little bit independent in your style / But how can I help but love you all the while / When you're so easy on the eyes.
The great revolution in the history of man, past, present and future, is the revolution of those determined to be free.
Freedom is nothing but a chance to be better.
People demand freedom of speech as a compensation for the freedom of thought which they seldom use.
They who can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary safety deserve neither liberty nor safety.
For to be free is not merely to cast off one's chains, but to live in a way that respects and enhances the freedom of others.
Freedom is not something that anybody can be given. Freedom is something people take, and people are as free as they want to be
How wrong is it for a woman to expect the man to build the world she wants, rather than to create it herself?
Those who expect to reap the blessings of freedom, must, like men, undergo the fatigues of supporting it.
I do not wish them (women) to have power over men; but over themselves.
I am an American; free born and free bred, where I acknowledge no man as my superior, except for his own worth, or as my inferior, except for his own demerit.
'Single' is an opportunity to live life on your own terms and not apologize.
But there are other words for privacy and independence. They are isolation and loneliness.
United States: the country where liberty is a statue.
Every path but your own is the path of fate. Keep on your own track, then.
